detail_desc: Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, textured, pima cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in a cotton rustle weave with smocking front and back, short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill, and a concealed zip at the back.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.

Low-heeled shoes in imitation patent leather with round toes a strap with a hook and loop fastening over the foot and a small loop at the back. Linings and patterned insoles in a cotton weave and chunky, patterned soles.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell.
3/4-length dungarees in washed cotton denim with adjustable straps that fasten at the front. Side pockets, a zip fly and wide, straight legs.
Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck with ties, short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless top in a silk crêpe weave in a wide, gently flared style with a rounded hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide panel at the top, side pockets and fold-down cuffs at the hems.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with a drawstring and frill trim at the cuffs and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a small V-neck. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Hooded cotton towel in velour with an all-over print on the front and a terry back. Hanger at the top.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Twill trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Soft, non-wired bandeau bras in cotton jersey and lace. Lined at the front. No fasteners.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Three printed and two in a solid colour.

Tunic in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, a gathered yoke at the back and open chest pockets. Long, gathered sleeves, wide cuffs with press-studs, a seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted sparkly button at the top and long sleeves.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a turn-down collar, French front and straight hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt to define the waist. Unlined.
Top in soft fabric with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a turtle neck, long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short, wide shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and viscose blend with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a concealed button-down collar and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft organic cotton textured knit with buttons down the front.
T-shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a small embroidered detail at the top. Rounded collar, button placket, puff sleeves and slits at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a wide foldover top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Nylon windbreaker with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped chest pocket, side pockets and an inner pocket. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long dolman sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.
Imitation suede sandals with rounded toes and block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed polo neck, shoulder tabs with a button, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress in an organic cotton weave with a flounce-trimmed seam at the top and buttons at the back. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trainers in mesh with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small, round shoulder bag in imitation leather with a glittery pattern, zip at the top and narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Width 4 cm, diameter 12.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and drawstring hood with a ribbed trim. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fully-fashioned, glittery hi-top trainers with a ribbed trim at the ankles and a grosgrain loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Sturdy, patterned rubber soles.
Short, gently flared skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and a high waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and jersey-lined drawstring hood with ribbing around the edge. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Pyjamas in a printed cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Swimsuit with a drawstring and gathers at the sides. Straight-cut at the top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim. Loose fit with a high waist, button fly and cut-off, raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Off-the-shoulder top in viscose jersey with elastication at the top and decorative buttons at the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated hem with a flounce.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and classic front. Matching tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Thickly padded puffer jacket with a stand-up collar, contrasting colour zip down the front and covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved, patterned sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Regular fit. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Width 50 cm, circumference 65 cm.
Calf-length dress in a patterned cotton weave with a smocked bodice, seam at the waist and flared skirt with flounces. Lined with a short skirt.
Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.

Playsuit in a cotton weave with a braided belt. Square neckline and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a wide, elasticated seam at the waist and patch front pockets.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Sequined hat in a soft knit with a faux fur pompom on top.
